scene_text: [' ( The METEOR MEAT delivery trucks back into the loading stall . )', ' ( The driver gets out of the truck and looks at HARLAN who stands in front of the doorway . )', ' [[Delivery_Man]] hey , harlan', ' [[Delivery_Man]] special delivery', ' [[Delivery_Man]] fresh shipment in from nebraska', ' [[Harlan]] great', ' [[Harlan]] just stack it in the freezer , will you ?', ' [[Harlan]] i got to open up', ' [[Delivery_Man]] all right , you got it , boss']
